responses: Hello! How can I assist you today?

Goodbye! Have a great day!
See you later! Take care!
Bye! Hope to see you again soon!
I'm a chatbot here to assist you with train ticket information.
You can call me TrainChat!
I'm your virtual assistant for train tickets.
I don't have an age like humans do, but I'm always learning!
Age is just a number! I'm here to help you.
I'm a virtual assistant, so I exist in the digital world!

You're welcome!

Anytime! Let me know if you need anything else.
